mapper.delete: DELETE FROM official_plan_log where member_email=#{email} and startdate = #{sDate} and authtime = #{authtime}
mapper.select: SELECT l.official_plan_log_id,l.member_email,l.plan_id,l.startdate,l.enddate,l.authtime,l.regtime,p.plan_name,p.need_auth_num from official_plan_log as l natural join official_plan as p where l.member_email = #{email} and date_format(#{sDate},'%Y-%m-%d') between l.startdate and l.enddate
